name: Seven Favors
description:
The Apocalypse comes in 7 days, are you prepared, insect?

To win us over, you must harvest the blood of your enemies to win Favour with us, and build up a devoted flock of your fellow man, tend to their needs, all in the hopes that when the 7th day comes, your favour obtained and your flock brought together, you will be seen in a better light than the others.

Developed as part of Ludum Dare 52 with myself, WitchGirlfriend and Nikita Vychuzhanin. The theme was "Harvest": 

https://witchgf.itch.io/

https://nikitavychuz.com/

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/52/seven-favors
